alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 618 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to near Eagle Mountain. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Eagle Mountain, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Ophir, Tooele Army Depot, Skull Valley, Tooele Army Depot South, Camp Williams, Saratoga Springs, Stockton, Rush Valley, Fairfield, Faust and Erda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
